nodes.text: Clento Rone was a Ithorian male Senator who represented the planet Ithor in the Galactic Senate during the Cold War and the Galactic War between the Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. After the Voidhound defeated the Voidwolf during the Battle of Corellia, Clento thanked the smuggler for saving his son who worked as an engineer in the Republic shipyards.
